title: Schedules & Plans: different options for printing plans
content: It is currently possible to print each of your plans, here is the procedure to follow:Log into your manager area,Access your plans by clicking on the Schedules and choose the Schedule & plans,Choose in the menu on the left, the plan you want to display,At the bottom of the page,  allows you to print your plan in PDF (Option 1)It is also possible to print it as it is presented on the screen by making shift + click on the print icon. (Option 2) The report tells you if there is a shortage of staff depending on the configuration of your plans.Option 1: Edit the report in PDF, to be able to print itOption 2: Print the plan as on the screenHelpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
